text: Muḥmiṉkaḷē! (Nīṅkaḷ ihrām kaṭṭiyirukkum camayattil uṅkaḷukku ēṟpaṭuttappaṭṭa) allāhviṉa mārkka aṭaiyāḷaṅkaḷaiyum, ciṟappāṉa mātaṅkaḷaiyum, kurpāṉikaḷaiyum, kurpāṉikkāka aṭaiyāḷam kaṭṭappeṟṟavaiyum, taṅkaḷuṭaiya iṟaivaṉiṉ aruḷaiyum tirupporuttattaiyum nāṭi kaṇṇiyamāṉa (avaṉuṭaiya) ālayattai nāṭic celvōraiyum (tākkuvataiyō, avamatippataiyō) nīṅkaḷ ākumākkik koḷḷātīrkaḷ;. Nīṅkaḷ ihrāmaik kaḷaintu viṭṭāl (aṉumatikkappaṭṭavaṟṟai) nīṅkaḷ vēṭṭaiyāṭalām;. Mēlum puṉita masjitai (kaḥpattullāhvai) viṭṭum uṅkaḷait taṭutta kūṭṭattiṉar mītuḷḷa veṟuppāṉatu, nīṅkaḷ varampu mīṟumāṟu uṅkaḷait tūṇṭi viṭa vēṇṭām;. Iṉṉum naṉmaiyilum; payapaktiyilum nīṅkaḷ oruvarukkoruvar utavi ceytu koḷḷuṅkaḷ;. Pāvattilum, pakaimaiyilum nīṅkaḷ oruvarukkoruvar utavi ceytu koḷḷa vēṇṭām;. Allāhvukkē payappaṭuṅkaḷ - niccayamāka allāh kaṭumaiyāka taṇṭippavaṉ
